summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.3°C) and outside temperature (down 3.3°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm) and cloud levels (up 636 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1586 m), and light levels (up 3790 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and calm and still conditions are expected. Showers, occasional overcast conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. Changeable conditions.
